elements.name: vehicleIntroExplanation
elements.title:
It's time to enter information about any vehicles that {deceasedName} are registered in British Columbia.

If {deceasedName} owned any vehicles, make sure you have the registration documents to help fill in the information.

vehicles that don't need a title transfer, don't need to be included here. for example a bicycle or small boat.

elements.name: question230
elements.title:
need to ask about cars worldwide, not just in BC.
Foreign Grant modifications?? - if resealing, only ask about cars inside bc. if ancillary, AND they said yes to stuff being handled well, only ask about cars inside bc. if ancillary BUt they said no to stuff being handled well, ask about the whole world.
